text: Black Holes and Revelations is the fourth album from the British alternative rock band, Muse. It was released in 2006. ==Songs== #Take a Bow #Starlight #Supermassive Black Hole #Map of the Problematique #Soldier's Poem #Invincible #Assassin #Exo-Politics #City of Delusion #Hoodoo #Knights of Cydonia ==References== Category:2006 albums Category:Muse albums
title: Black Holes and Revelations
